TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void FrameHandler(object o, FrameArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed FrameHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the FrameHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the FrameHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the FrameHandler is removed from the event.
